prompt: What is the total sales in october 2022 ?
gt_sql: SELECT SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as Total_Sale FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-10-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-11-01'
gt_analysis: The total sales in october 2022 is €462,807.74.

prompt: How many units we sold in september 2022 ?
gt_sql: SELECT SUM(Qty_Sold) as Total_Units FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-09-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-10-01'
gt_analysis: The total units sold in september 2022 is 35,099.

prompt: Find product categories that decreased sales during the 2021 holiday season (November to December)
gt_sql: SELECT Product_Class_Code, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as Total_Sale FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-11-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-12-01' GROUP BY Product_Class_Code ORDER BY Total_Sale DESC
gt_analysis: The product categories that decreased sales during the 2021 holiday season (November to December) are: 22975 with €95,095.53, 22800 with €75,044.44, 24425 with €61,189.67, 24400 with €61,180.95, 22900 with €53,564.87, 22850 with €49,455.34, 24375 with €41,718.81, 22875 with €25,103.34, 22925 with €17,076.86, 22825 with €11,950.19, 22950 with €8,604.43.

prompt: How much was the variational change between in sales beween January to February in 2022
gt_sql: SELECT (SELECT SUM(Total_Sale_Value) FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-02-01') - (SELECT SUM(Total_Sale_Value) FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-02-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-03-01') AS Sales_Variation
gt_analysis: The sales variation between January and February 2022 is €54,671.11.

prompt: List top 10 stores by average transaction value during December 2021
gt_sql: SELECT Store_Number, AVG(Total_Sale_Value) as Average_Transaction_Value FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2021-12-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-01-01' GROUP BY Store_Number ORDER BY Average_Transaction_Value DESC LIMIT 10
gt_analysis: The top 10 stores by average transaction value during December 2021 are: 4400 with €42.09, 2970 with €29.88, 1210 with €24.46, 2750 with €23.89, 2200 with €23.77, 1650 with €23.47, 1540 with €23.36, 880 with €23.35, 990 with €23.29, 3300 with €23.18.

prompt: Show me in a bar plot the monthly sales in 2022
gt_sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', Sold_Date) as month_start, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as total_revenue FROM sales WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM Sold_Date) = 2022 GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', Sold_Date) ORDER BY month_start ASC

prompt: Show store performance for Q1 2022 (January to March) in total revenue, ordered by total revenue.
gt_sql: SELECT Store_Number, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as Total_Revenue FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-04-01' GROUP BY Store_Number ORDER BY Total_Revenue DESC

prompt: Give me by SKU level the top 3 products in January 2022
gt_sql: SELECT SKU_Coded, Product_Class_Code, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as Total_Revenue FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-02-01' GROUP BY Product_Class_Code, SKU_Coded ORDER BY Total_Revenue DESC LIMIT 3
gt_analysis: The top 3 products in January 2022 are: 22975 with €109,375.06, 22800 with €64,642.27, 24400 with €58,709.36.

prompt: Which stores sold more than 1000 items in December 2021? Show total and promo sales, then plot them with a visualization
gt_sql: SELECT Store_Number, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) as Total_Revenue, SUM(CASE WHEN On_Promo = 1 THEN Total_Sale_Value ELSE 0 END) as Promo_Revenue FROM sales WHERE Sold_Date >= DATE '2021-12-01' AND Sold_Date < DATE '2022-01-01' GROUP BY Store_Number HAVING SUM(Qty_Sold) > 1000 ORDER BY Total_Revenue DESC

gt_vis.title: Total Sales by Store in December 2021

prompt: Show me all the sales registered from January 2022 to January 2023, grouped by month. Then show me some insights about the sales and plot the data as bar plot - visualization
gt_sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', CAST(Sold_Date AS DATE)) AS month_start, SUM(Total_Sale_Value) AS total_revenue FROM sales WHERE CAST(Sold_Date AS DATE) >= DATE '2022-01-01' AND CAST(Sold_Date AS DATE) < DATE '2023-01-01' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC
gt_analysis: The sales registered from January 2022 to January 2023 are: January - €460,090.19, February - €405,419.08, March - €412,956.59, April - €371,117.71, May - €324,769.28, June - €324,996.19, July - €346,132.11, August - €368,018.06, September - €403,554.18, October - €462,807.74, November - €530,981.69, December - €884,818.40.
